issue.title: [Plasma] Fix deprecated PLASMA_DEFAULT_RELEASE_DELAY
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2612](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2612). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The deprecated PLASMA_DEFAULT_RELEASE_DELAY is currently broken, since it refers to kDeprecatedPlasmaDefaultReleaseDelay without the plasma:: namespace qualifier.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2612?focusedCommentId=16481428) by Philipp Moritz (pcmoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2063
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2063>
